original_title: Saint Vitus: Live in Hamburg at Markthalle
overview: Live in Harmburg at Markthalle, 2010.  1. Intro, 2. Interviews, 3. Song: “Saint Vitus”, 4. Song: “The Troll”, 5. Song: “White Stallions”, 6. Song: “Mystic Lady”, 7. Interlude: Wino and Dave talking to the audience + Session before “Born Too Late”, 8. Song: “Born Too Late”, 9. Outro with audience and band (credits etc.), 10. Bonustrack: “Dying Inside”
title: Saint Vitus: Live in Hamburg at Markthalle
